attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel adults should be able to enjoy adult films without being censored.
We are allowed to see many horrors on TV such as in Iraq ect yet we cannot see couples making love without it being censored.
We want to see a stop to censorship of adult viewing on TV and in the Cimamas.

We need to remove censorship from adult films/plays and or other forms of media.
